%title IO

%toc IO


= 终端 =

用户输入：

{{{class="brush: scala"
val str = Console.readLine
}}}

= 文件 =

== 写入 ==

{{{class="brush: scala"
import java.io._

val writer = new PrintWriter(new File("tmp.txt'))
writer write "test"
writer.close()
}}}

== 读取 ==

{{{class="brush: scala"
import scala.io.Source

Source.fromFile("tmp.txt").foreach { print }
}}}

`foreach()`每次读一个字符（输入有缓冲，不用担心性能）。用`getLines()`可以读一行
。`getLine(index)`可以取得指定行，是索引，从0开始。


= 读取URL =

{{{class="brush: scala"
import scala.io.Source
import java.net.URL

val source = Source.fromURL(new URL("http://ifconfig.me/ip"))
source.getLines().foreach{ println }
}}}
